text: "Blow My Mind" is a song by American-born Nigerian singer Davido, featuring American R&B; singer Chris Brown. It was released on July 26, 2019 as the fourth single from Davido's album A Good Time. The song was written by Davido and Brown, and produced by Shizzi. The song enjoyed major success in African countries, with the videoclip of the song achieving the record of major views on YouTube in the first 24 hours for a Nigerian artist. The song incorporates tribal sounds of African music. ==Track listing== *Digital download #"Blow My Mind" (featuring Chris Brown) – 3:21 ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Davido songs Category:Chris Brown songs Category:Songs written by Chris Brown Category:Song recordings produced by Shizzi
title: Blow My Mind (Davido and Chris Brown song)
